synopsis.text: Ozu, the mischievous friend of an unnamed protagonist, accidentally ruins the remote control for their dormitory's air conditioner by spilling Coke on it, leaving them to endure a scorching summer. In an unexpected turn of events, the protagonist's love interest, Akashi, arrives with her film crew, and they discover a peculiar object that resembles a time machine. Desperate to retrieve the remote control and escape the heat, the group embarks on a risky journey through time to prevent Ozu's clumsy mistake. However, their meddling with the past triggers a series of unforeseen consequences that threaten to disrupt the fabric of the universe. As the protagonist navigates the complexities of time travel, he must outwit the chaos caused by Ozu's antics to save the day and restore order.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
